name: Bay Area Transit Map by Courtney Garg Brousseau
description:
Last year, transit advocate Courtney Garg Brousseau was tragically killed by senseless gun violence at age 22. Before he passed, he was working on a passion project: building a NY MTA-inspired map of SF transit in Figma.


With his family's permission, I recreated Courtney’s map with the help of a few volunteers from Figma. We want to build on his work, as a community. We encourage you to check out, comment on, and help us complete the file.


You can read about how we recreated the map here and get more context through this Twitter thread. Learn more about Courtney’s life and legacy here, including ways to contribute to nonprofits that touch Courtney’s passion for government, transit, and technology.
